        <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script_client"><sys_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_extended>true</applies_extended><condition/><description>Display the existing settings</description><field>sys_scope</field><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ShowSettings</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord(g_form.getTableName());
	alert('Here....');
	gr.addOrderBy('sys_created_on');
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();
	gr.next();
		
	if(!(gr.get('base_url'))){
		g_form.setValue(gr.get('base_url'));
	 }
	
	if(!(gr.get('user_name'))){
		 g_form.setValue(gr.get('user_name'));
	 }
	
	if(!(gr.get('password'))){
		g_form.setValue(gr.get('password'));
	 }
	
	if(!(gr.get('incident_polling_interval'))){
		g_form.setValue(gr.get('incident_polling_interval'));
	 }
	g_form.setValue('base_url','Test URL');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-17 07:07:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ed229b56db202300c6d764d74896199b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShowSettings</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Proofpoint - ServiceNow Integration App" source="x_271757_proofpoin">870f5d61db202300c6d764d748961957</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Proofpoint - ServiceNow Integration App">870f5d61db202300c6d764d748961957</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_client_ed229b56db202300c6d764d74896199b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-17 14:18:56</sys_updated_on><table>x_271757_proofpoin_proofpoint_app_configuration</table><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><view/></sys_script_client></record_update></payload>
